introduction: 女儿郑珍决定离开从小到大生活的城市去上海工作，父亲郑毅送女儿去机场。一路上，郑毅仍然希望能够说服女儿留在本地当个老师，这让原本希望得到父亲支持的女儿郑珍感到不满，俩人在车里发生了争执。但面对渐渐接近的机场，即将到来的离别，俩人也在笨拙地努力达成某种和解。Daughter Zheng Zhen decided to leave the city where she grew up to work in Shanghai, and her father Zheng Yi sent her to the airport. Along the way, Zheng Yi still hoped to persuade her daughter to stay here and work as a teacher. This made her daughter Zheng Zhen, who originally hoped to be supported by her father, felt dissatisfied, and they had a dispute in the car. But in the face of the approaching airport and the upcoming parting, they were also awkwardly trying to reach some kind of reconciliation.
